    • Method Detail

      • json

        public static JSONFormat json()
        Retrieves the JSON body format.
        Returns:
        the singleton JSON body format instance

      • get

        public Result<javax.json.JsonObject,Failure> get(Message<?> message)
        Description copied from interface: Format
        Retrieves a body representation from a message.

        Processing failure should be reported using the following HTTP status codes:

        • Response.UnsupportedMediaType for missing bodies;
        • Response.BadRequest for malformed bodies, unless a more specific status code is available.

        The default implementation returns a failure reporting the Response.UnsupportedMediaType status, unless explicitly overridden.

        Specified by:
        get in interface Format<javax.json.JsonObject>
        Parameters:
        message - the message whose body representation managed by this body format is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the optional JSON body representation of message, as retrieved from the reader supplied by its ReaderFormat representation, if one is present and the value of the Content-Type header is equal to "application/json"; a failure reporting the Response.UnsupportedMediaType status, otherwise

      • set

        public <M extends Message<M>> M set(M message,
                                    javax.json.JsonObject value)
        Configures the WriterFormat representation of message to write the JSON value to the writer supplied by the accepted writer and sets the Content-Type header to "application/json".
        Specified by:
        set in interface Format<javax.json.JsonObject>
        Type Parameters:
        M - the type of message
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be configured to hold a body representation managed by this body format
        value - the body representation being configured for message by this body format
        Returns:
        the configured message
